mapper.select: select b.*,(select res_address from restaurant where res_no=b.res_no) as res_address, (select res_address_detail from restaurant where res_no=b.res_no) as res_address_detail, (select res_name from restaurant where res_no=b.res_no) as res_name from book b where mem_no=#{memNo}

SELECT A.BOOK_NO , A.MEM_NO , A.RES_NO , A.BOOK_DATE , A.BOOK_NUM , A.BOOK_CHECK , A.BOOK_TIME , B.MEM_NAME , B.MEM_TEL1 , B.MEM_TEL2 , B.MEM_TEL3
FROM BOOK A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE RES_NO = (SELECT RES_NO FROM RESTAURANT WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo})
